wikitext.*:
'''''A Tolkien Dictionary''''', or '''[http://www.quicksilver899.com/Tolkien/Tolkien_Dictionary.html www.quicksilver899.com/Tolkien/Tolkien_Dictionary.html]''', is a website operated by Robert Ireland. It is an extensive online linguistic dictionary of people and places.  Sample output:

:'''[[Gildor]] (Inglorion)'''    S; ''Gildor'' see Sil; '''ID-''' heart, desire, Nol ''inn'', ''ind'' [Etym]; '''LÁWAR-''', Nol '''GLÁWAR-''' golden [light], Nol ''glor-'', ''lor-'' in names [Etym]; perhaps implied is '''NGOL-''' wise, lore, magic [Etym]; -ion forms a masc. name suffix from '''YO''', '''YON-''' son, Q & Nol ''-ion'' [Etym]; Inglorion = ''Mind of gold'' (''-en'' wisdom?); an Elf at [[Rivendell]].
